Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Montreal in 2004...
Injured on 4/19/2008 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2009, off Jerome Williams (ATL)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2009...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2009, going 3-2, 1.34...
Traded from Washington to San Diego on 2/4/2010 (Going to WSH: P S. Strasburg. Going to SDN: P W. Davis, P C. Volstad)...
Injured on 6/5/2010 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 8/22/2012, off Tim Lincecum (SF)...
Won World Championship with San Diego in 2014...
Struck out 15 batters against Washington on 6/19/2015...
Traded from San Diego to New York (A) on 3/2/2017 (Going to SDN: SS D. Robertson, P M. Fulmer, C T. Joseph, LF S. Gutierrez. Going to NYA: P W. Davis, P G. Casiano, C M. Kamps)...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 6/1/2017...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2019, going 5-0, 2.45...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2020, going 5-0, 0.92...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
